name: Guts and Glory
description: A game about father and son riding their bicycle through obstacle courses of death, and other fun family experiences.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 650M / Radeon R9 M375 or higher graphics card (see Additional Notes below). DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible Additional Notes: Dedicated graphics card means NOT an Intel HD _____.  Basically any video card with a benchmark of 1,200+ (see: <a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.videocardbenchmark.net)" target="_blank" rel="noopener"  >www.videocardbenchmark.net).  Technically runs on lower, but at your own risk.  Controller recommended for best experience.  Keyboard and mouse needed for Level Editor.
